CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaTech Solutions relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: NovaTech Solutions is {above} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starlight Innovations relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Starlight Innovations is {below} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironclad Ventures relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Ironclad Ventures is {above} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer acquisition cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {NovaTech Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer acquisition cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starlight Innovations}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Innovations's maximum Customer Acquisition Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Innovations's maximum Customer Acquisition Cost is in {2002}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironclad Ventures's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironclad Ventures's minimum Customer Acquisition Cost is in {2013}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2004, did the total Customer Acquisition Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2011?
NC.A: The change in total customer acquisition cost between 2002 and 2004 was {larger} than between 2004 and 2011.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2011, did the total Customer Acquisition Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 2003 and 2005?
NC.A: The change in total customer acquisition cost between 2005 and 2011 was {larger} than between 2003 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2012, did the total Customer Acquisition Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 2010 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total customer acquisition cost between 2006 and 2012 was {larger} than between 2010 and 2012.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2013, was the average total Customer Acquisition Cost higher or lower than between 2005 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total customer acquisition cost between 2004 and 2013 was {higher} than between 2005 and 2007.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {NovaTech Solutions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starlight Innovations and Ironclad Ventures first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starlight Innovations and Ironclad Ventures first exchanged leading positions in {2007}.
